## WebjsContext.makeCallbackSafe() method

Create a function which execute a callback in a try-catch block that will grab errors en send them to the `Webshell` component.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
makeCallbackSafe<T extends Function>(callback: T): T;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  callback | T | The callback to try-catch. |

<b>Returns:</b>

T
